nodes.documentation:
@title Finer
 The contract that allows to pay the fines for vouching for bad submissions in the ProofOfHumanity smart contract.
 The fines should be paid to the challenger that exposed the bad submission of a particular request.
 Note that the paid addresses and related amounts are not stored because the fine is not tied to the blockchain addresses but to the actual people.
 The fact of funding as well as the required amount will be established and recorded off-chain.
nodes.name: Finer
FinePaid
payFine

 The fines should be paid to the challenger that exposed the bad submission of a particular request.

 The fact of funding as well as the required amount will be established and recorded off-chain.
attributes.name: Finer
FinePaid
payFine

payFine(address,uint256).details: Pays the fine and sends it to a particular address. Emits an event.

params._challenger: The address to pay the fine to.
params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract that the challenger won.

devdoc.title: Finer The contract that allows to pay the fines for vouching for bad submissions in the ProofOfHumanity smart contract. The fines should be paid to the challenger that exposed the bad submission of a particular request. Note that the paid addresses and related amounts are not stored because the fine is not tied to the blockchain addresses but to the actual people. The fact of funding as well as the required amount will be established and recorded off-chain.
